content:
Hello,
Our security team is saying they'd like us to upgrade payara to a version not susceptible to https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2022-45129. In theory that's 5.2022.5 (and .4 as well, but we'd go to .5 if possible) (we are on 5.2022.3 now).

Does anyone know for sure what highest version of Paraya that Dataverse 5.13 is capable of running in?

Thanks!
